widget.header: Top 10 Netflix Documentaries For Graphic Designers

description: "Generating ideas and solutions in the creative world is essential; several techniques such as brainstorming, mind mapping, storyboarding, and more definitely help. Additionally, content on the Internet provides innovative ideas; such is the case of Netflix. The platform broadcasts documentaries aimed at artists, designers, photographers, creatives, and those willing to boost their creativity. I recommend reading this article; you will find useful suggestions in those documentaries to get some of the best ideas and inspiration while taking a break"
